intro: Will collect all the details and reveal the most interesting secrets!
description:
Classic puzzle game where you unlock vivid and sensual illustrations step by step! The game focuses on attractive girls in glamorous and daring outfits. They are all ready to charm you with their looks.

All images are created with love for the smallest details, and their expressive poses, stylish outfits and bright emotions give each illustration a special atmosphere. The realistic assembly mechanics will make you feel like you are assembling a real paper puzzle. Relaxing music will help you to fully immerse yourself in the game.

Game Features:
- 40+ passionate puzzles featuring seductive anime girls
- High-quality and sensual illustrations
- Realistic assembly process with smooth animations
- Atmospheric music accompaniment
- Ability to view collected images in detail
